head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths STIGER, VIRGINIA Q.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths STIGER, VIRGINIA Q.

block.p: STIGER-Virginia Q. At the age of 91, on May 29th, 2000 of Centre Island, NY. Beloved wife of William M. Devoted mother of Anthony D., Sarah S. Ewing, and Christian H. Grandmother of five, great-grandmother of one. Memorial service Thursday, June 1, 2000 at 11:00 A.M., The Christ Church, East Main Street, Oyster Bay. In lieu of flowers donations may be made to the Nature Conservancy, 250 Lawrence Hill Road, Cold Spring Harbor, NY 11724. For further information please contact the Francis P. DeVine Funeral Home Inc., 516-922-6700.
